name: Equii's Evolution Simulator
description:
This is a prototype for an evolution simulator / ecosystem simulator by Equii.

Patch 0.0.4 -

  • Fixed creature colours only coming in yellow, green, red and orange
  • Updated UI
  • Fixed terrarium species names not being passed on to child objects

Features so far -

  • Top down land simulation
  • Aquarium simulation
  • Simple Evolution
  • Saving and loading
Controls -
  • 'R' to restart
  • 'Enter' to switch simulations
  • 'S' for save
  • 'L' for load
  • 'D' to turn off statistics
